ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Followup - The Horn of Hsagra
ygData.msgSnippet: While I still think the horn is worth 5 Lutes, it s a nice item and grats.  I know you were doing the trade more for the good rep than great loot.  And it was
ygData.messageBody:
While I still think the horn is worth 5 Lutes, it's a nice item and
grats. I know you were doing the trade more for the good rep than great
loot. And it was not "probably" a loot-table mix-up, it definitely was
=) I wish I would have gotten the 16/22 monk fist in Lesser Fay heh.

Shada/Erisi

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 23, 2001 2:21 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Followup - The Horn of Hsagra


Well, you guys asked me to let you know what I got for the Horn in the
end. To bring you up to date, I lucked into a Horn of Hsagra, doing a
low-level quest in Ak'Anon (probably due to a loot-table mixup). I
offered
it to a friend of mine who is in a guild, and he said to write my own
ticket. So I did. I requested the Lute of the Howler, and some coins
for
the Nostrolo Tambourine quest. I didn't expect to get all of that, but
I
was hopeful.
